subject: Bicycle Motocross
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Still a teenager, Connor Fields is the first rider in BMX supercross history to win three straight World Cup final races, and he has become a medal favorite for the London Olympics.
snippet: Still a teenager, Connor Fields is the first rider in BMX supercross history to win three straight World Cup final races, and he has become a medal favorite for the London Olympics.
